Package ohos.media.codec

Class TrackInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.media.codec.TrackInfo

  • public class TrackInfo
extends Object
    Stores track IDs and media formats. This class is used as the output for the Codec#setSource method of the Codec class. For details, see Codec#setSource method.
    Since:
    1
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Multimedia#MEDIA
